word:
He [God] has not made it the special work of Dr. Kellogg to go into the worst dens of iniquity in the large cities. The Lord does not require impossibilities of men. He gives to every man his work. The work which He gave to Dr. Kellogg was to symbolize to the world the ministry of the gospel 


                                 -417- 

in medical missionary work.--Letter 205, 1899, p. 6. (To Dr. J. H. Kellogg, typed December 19, 1899.)
